name: David Letterman
monologue: There’s a fatwa on me. They say the guy that issued it is an Internet jihadist. Who says Obama isn’t creating jobs?

name: David Letterman
monologue: Top Ten Thought’s That Went Through Letterman’s Mind After Hearing About the Threat

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Everyone is watching the big global news story. We’re seeing historic changes rocking one of the most ruthless families on earth. That’s right, Kim Kardashian got married.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Some people think Gadhafi will go into exile somewhere harmless where we can keep an eye on him. I’m thinking “Dancing With the Stars.”

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: I think I speak for everyone when I say we’re hoping for an end to the bloodshed, a peaceful transition to democracy, and . . . cheaper gas.
